DANCING.original: When indicated perform a hold move by holding ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~. Keep it held for the duration of the move to increase your dance meter.~n~Press ~INPUT_ENTER~ for more instructions.~n~Press ~INPUT_SPRINT~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 提示「保持！」时按住~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~可以持续积累跳舞量表。~n~按~INPUT_ENTER~查看后续教程。~n~按~INPUT_SPRINT~开始跳舞。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出。

DANCING.original: When the speaker glows red perform a hold move by holding ~INPUT_MOVE_LEFT~ or ~INPUT_MOVE_RIGHT~ in one direction.
DANCING.translated: 扬声器图标变红时，朝一个方向按下~INPUT_MOVE_LEFT~或~INPUT_MOVE_RIGHT~以保持动作。

DANCING.original: Press buttons in time to the music to dance.~n~~PAD_A~ Lower~n~~PAD_B~ Right~n~~PAD_X~ Left~n~~PAD_Y~ Upper~n~~INPUT_PICKUP~ stop dancing.
DANCING.translated: 跟随音乐节奏按下按键跳舞。~n~~PAD_A~ 往下~n~~PAD_B~ 往右~n~~PAD_X~ 往左~n~~PAD_Y~ 往上~n~~INPUT_PICKUP~ 停止跳舞。

DANCING.original: Press buttons in time to the music to dance.~n~~PAD_A~ Lower~n~~PAD_B~ Right~n~~PAD_X~ Left~n~~PAD_Y~ Upper~n~~PAD_LB~ stop dancing.
DANCING.translated: 跟随音乐节奏按下按键跳舞。~n~~PAD_A~ 往下~n~~PAD_B~ 往右~n~~PAD_X~ 往左~n~~PAD_Y~ 往上~n~~PAD_LB~ 停止跳舞。

DANCING.original: During a hold press ~PAD_LT~ or ~PAD_RT~ in time to the music to boost your dance meter.~n~Press ~PAD_Y~ for more instructions.~n~Press ~PAD_A~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~PAD_LB~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 「保持！」期间随节拍按下~PAD_LT~或~PAD_RT~可以积累大量跳舞量表。~n~按~PAD_Y~查看后续教程。~n~按~PAD_A~开始跳舞。~n~按~PAD_LB~退出。

DANCING.original: Your moves have impressed.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~ to dance with the girl.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~ to decline.~n~Press ~PAD_LB~ to stop dancing.
DANCING.translated: 你的舞步令人刮目相看。~n~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~和姑娘一起跳舞。~n~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~谢绝。~n~按~PAD_LB~停止跳舞。

DANCING.original: Fill your dance meter without many mistakes and you will take part in a special group dance sequence.~n~Press ~INPUT_SPRINT~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 尽量避免失误，填满跳舞量表，即可触发特殊的团体舞步。~n~按~INPUT_SPRINT~开始跳舞。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出。

DANCING.original: Fill your dance meter by pressing ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ in time to the music.~n~Press ~INPUT_ENTER~ for more instructions.~n~Press ~INPUT_SPRINT~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 随节拍按下~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~积累跳舞量表。~n~按~INPUT_ENTER~查看后续教程。~n~按~INPUT_SPRINT~开始跳舞。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出。

DANCING.original: Press buttons in time to the music to dance.~n~~PAD_A~ Lower~n~~PAD_B~ Right~n~~PAD_X~ Left~n~~PAD_Y~ Upper~n~~PAD_LB~ stop dancing.
DANCING.translated: 跟随音乐节奏按下按键跳舞。~n~~PAD_A~ 往下~n~~PAD_B~ 往右~n~~PAD_X~ 往左~n~~PAD_Y~ 往上~n~~PAD_LB~ 停止跳舞。

DANCING.original: Move ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ and ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ in time with the music to dance.
Move ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ and ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ in time with the music to dance.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to stop dancing.
DANCING.translated: 随节拍推动~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~或~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~跳舞。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~停止跳舞。

DANCING.original: Press buttons in time to the music to dance.~n~~PAD_A~ Lower~n~~PAD_B~ Right~n~~PAD_X~ Left~n~~PAD_Y~ Upper~n~~INPUT_PICKUP~ stop dancing.
DANCING.translated: 跟随音乐节奏按下按键跳舞。~n~~PAD_A~ 往下~n~~PAD_B~ 往右~n~~PAD_X~ 往左~n~~PAD_Y~ 往上~n~~INPUT_PICKUP~ 停止跳舞。

DANCING.original: During a hold press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ or ~INPUT_AIM~ in time to the music to boost your dance meter.~n~Press ~INPUT_ENTER~ for more instructions.~n~Press ~INPUT_SPRINT~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 「保持！」期间随节拍按下~INPUT_ATTACK~或~INPUT_AIM~可以积累大量跳舞量表。~n~按~INPUT_ENTER~查看后续教程。~n~按~INPUT_SPRINT~开始跳舞。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出。
正在播放的舞蹈动画是 ~a~

DANCING.original: When indicated perform a hold move by holding ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ or ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ in one direction. Keep it held for the duration of the move to increase your dance meter.~n~Press ~PAD_Y~ for more instructions.~n~Press ~PAD_A~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~PAD_LB~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 提示「保持！」时将~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~或~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~之一推到底可以持续积累跳舞量表。~n~按~PAD_Y~查看后续教程。~n~按~PAD_A~开始跳舞。~n~按~PAD_LB~退出。

DANCING.original: Fill your dance meter by moving ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ or ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ in time to the music.~n~Press ~PAD_Y~ for more instructions.~n~Press ~PAD_A~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~PAD_LB~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 随节拍推动~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~或~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~积累跳舞量表。~n~按~PAD_Y~查看后续教程。~n~按~PAD_A~开始跳舞。~n~按~PAD_LB~退出。

DANCING.original: Your dance bar is full. ~n~Press ~PAD_X~, ~PAD_Y~, ~PAD_A~, ~PAD_B~ to perform a special move.
DANCING.translated: 你的跳舞量表已充满。~n~按~PAD_X~~PAD_Y~~PAD_A~~PAD_B~之一可表演特殊动作。

DANCING.original: Press ~INPUT_ENTER~ for instructions.~n~Press ~INPUT_SPRINT~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 按~INPUT_ENTER~查看教程。~n~按~INPUT_SPRINT~开始跳舞。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出。

DANCING.original: When the speaker glows red perform a hold move by holding ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ or ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ in one direction.
DANCING.translated: 扬声器图标变红时，朝一个方向推动~INPUT_MOVE_LEFT~或~INPUT_MOVE_RIGHT~以保持动作。

DANCING.original: Press ~PAD_Y~ for instructions.~n~Press ~PAD_A~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~PAD_LB~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 按~PAD_Y~查看教程。~n~按~PAD_A~开始跳舞。~n~按~PAD_LB~退出。

DANCING.original: Move ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ and ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to perform special moves.
Fill your dance meter without many mistakes and you will take part in a special group dance sequence.~n~Press ~PAD_A~ to start dancing.~n~Press ~PAD_LB~ to exit.
DANCING.translated: 尽量避免失误，填满跳舞量表，即可触发特殊的团体舞步。~n~按~PAD_A~开始跳舞。~n~按~PAD_LB~退出。

DANCING.original: Your moves have impressed.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~ to dance with the girl.~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~ to decline.~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to stop dancing.
DANCING.translated: 你的舞步令人刮目相看。~n~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~和姑娘一起跳舞。~n~按~INPUT_FRONTEND_CANCEL~谢绝。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~停止跳舞。

DANCING.original: Move ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ and ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ in time with the music to dance.~n~Press ~PAD_LB~ to stop dancing.
DANCING.translated: 随节拍推动~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~或~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~跳舞。~n~按~PAD_LB~停止跳舞。
